Interface WebServerFactory

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConfigurableJettyWebServerFactory, ConfigurableReactiveWebServerFactory, ConfigurableServletWebServerFactory, ConfigurableTomcatWebServerFactory, ConfigurableWebServerFactory, ReactiveWebServerFactory, ServletWebServerFactory
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfigurableWebServerFactory, AbstractReactiveWebServerFactory, JettyReactiveWebServerFactory, JettyServletWebServerFactory, JettyWebServerFactory, NettyReactiveWebServerFactory, TomcatReactiveWebServerFactory, TomcatServletWebServerFactory, TomcatWebServerFactory
public interface WebServerFactory
Tagging interface for factories that create a WebServer.
Since:
2.0.0
